text: Their Satanic Majesties Request is the eighth American studio album and sixth British studio album by The Rolling Stones. Decca Records and London Records released it on December 8, 1967. It is their first album to be released the same way in the United States and the United Kingdom. The band made psychedelic music for the album. The band produced the album. Andrew Loog Oldham did not work with the band for the album. The band recorded the album from February 1967 to October 1967. Many members of the band used drugs while recording the album. via the Digital Library of the University of North Texas. Their Satanic Majesties Request got good and bad reviews from music critics. Some people thought the album copied the Beatles album Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band. After the album was released, the Rolling Stones went back to making blues music. ==Track listing== == References == Category:1967 albums Category:The Rolling Stones albums
title: Their Satanic Majesties Request
